document.full_text: a u.s. high school student was shot dead by a hotel security guard in costa rica on thursday after being mistaken for a thief, police said.
document.title: u.s. teenager mistakenly killed by costa rica hotel guard
lines_and_colors: a u.s. high school student was shot dead by a hotel security guard in costa rica on thursday after being mistaken for a thief, police said.
